ants

Class AntBotGameInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • basis.BotGameInfo
      • ants.AntBotGameInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<AntBotGameInfo>

    public class AntBotGameInfo
extends BotGameInfo
implements java.lang.Comparable<AntBotGameInfo>
    This class holds informations about the ant game a bot is currently playing.
    Author:
    Nicolas

    • Field Detail

      • relativeBotIds

        private java.util.Map<Bot,java.lang.Integer> relativeBotIds
        Contains the bot identifiers viewed by the bot. A bot always view himself as being the bot 0. Every time the bot encounters a bot it has not encountered before, a new identifier is given to it. This mechanism prevents the bot from knowing the number of bots currently playing in the game.

      • nbrOfBotsEncountered

        private int nbrOfBotsEncountered
        The number of different bots encountered during the game. It's used to determine the next identifier in the relative bot identifiers list.

      • ants

        private java.util.ArrayList<Ant> ants
        The list of ants that belong to the bot.

      • hills

        private java.util.ArrayList<AntHill> hills
        The list of hills that belong to the bot.

      • hive

        private int hive
        The state of the hive. The hive is the number of ant to spawn from the hill(s).

      • deathReason

        private java.lang.String deathReason
        The reason of death.

      • deathTurn

        private int deathTurn
        The turn at which the bot died, or -1 if it is not dead yet.

      • rank

        private int rank
        Used to store the rank of the bot in the game.
